# SHSignature

**Class**

An object that contains the opaque data and other information for a signature.

## Declaration

```swift
class SHSignature
```

## Overview

Save your signature to a file and share it with others by writing the data to a file. You can use the saved signatures of reference recordings to populate a custom catalog.

Check whether your captured query signature is long enough to search for a match by comparing [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHSignature/duration] to the [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHCatalog/minimumQuerySignatureDuration] and [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHCatalog/maximumQuerySignatureDuration] of a catalog.

## Creating a signature object

- **init(dataRepresentation:)**: Creates a signature object from raw data.

## Reading signature information

- **dataRepresentation**: The raw data for the signature.
- **duration**: The duration of the audio you use to generate the signature.

## Slicing signature segments

- **slices(from:duration:stride:)**: Returns a sequence of signatures of the specified duration from a starting value, stepping by the stride.
- **SHSignature.Slices**: A sequence of signature segments.

## Getting the content type

- **shazamSignature**: A type that represents a signature.

## Create a signature from audio

- **SHSignatureGenerator**: An object for converting audio data into a signature.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
